text: An excise team along with Flying Squad sealed three liquor bars attached to TASMAC shops situated at different places in the town on Thursday after the bars were found functioning well before the permitted time. Acting on a complaint, the team found three bars operating at 7 a.m. and serving customers although the bars were permitted to function from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m. Sources said the bars were operating opposite to the new bus stand, near four road junction and another in the town area.
title: Three liquor bars sealed
